Uses of Class
org.waarp.common.crypto.KeyManager

  • Packages that use KeyManager 
    Package Description
    org.waarp.common.crypto
    Classes implementing Encryption for Password support or for File Encryption AES is the best compromise in term of security and efficiency.

    • Uses of KeyManager in org.waarp.common.crypto

      Subclasses of KeyManager in org.waarp.common.crypto 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AesManager
      This class implements a simple Key Manager for AES class from name
      class  BlowfishManager
      This class implements a simple Key Manager for Blowfish class from name
      class  DesManager
      This class implements a simple Key Manager for DES class from name
      class  DynamicKeyManager
      Can implements AES, ARCFOUR, Blowfish, DES, DESede, RC2, RC4

      The time ratio are: RC4,ARCFOUR=1; AES,RC2=1,5; DES=2; Blowfish,DESede=4
      AES is the best compromise in term of security and efficiency.
      class  HmacSha1Manager
      This class implements a simple Key Manager for HmacSha1 class from name
      class  HmacSha256Manager
      This class implements a simple Key Manager for HmacSha1 class from name
      Methods in org.waarp.common.crypto that return KeyManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static KeyManager AesManager.getInstance() 
      static KeyManager BlowfishManager.getInstance() 
      static KeyManager HmacSha1Manager.getInstance() 
      static KeyManager HmacSha256Manager.getInstance() 
      static KeyManager DynamicKeyManager.getInstance()
